title: My Pixel 5's battery drained out and simply won't charge. It shows the charging icon but wont start
content:
My phone's battery drained out and it turned off. I plugged it and left it for and hour and when I got back to it, it wasn't charged at all. The charging icon was being displayed but it wasn't going above 0% and it won't turn on. Tried different chargers but it just won't charge. I have really important data on the phone.

PLEASE HELP.
